## Installing {-}

Open "ReadabilityStudio.dmg" and drag-and-drop the program into the "Applications" folder.

## Updating {-}

Open "ReadabilityStudio.dmg" and drag-and-drop the program into the "Applications" folder, replacing the existing copy.
